ofx:section.ofx:title: Preparation
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
launchctl unload -w ~/Library/LaunchAgents/homebrew.mxcl.mysql.plist launchctl load -w ~/Library/LaunchAgents/homebrew.mxcl.mysql.plist
/usr/local/bin/mysql.server start /usr/local/bin/mysql.server restart /usr/local/bin/mysql.server stop
